title: brent19862011
author: brent19862011
content: (Verse 1)Together as a group we stand, bitchvoogalmasterVoogaled and strong, in this congested land.Our voice loud and clear, we have no fear,As we voogal it, voogal it, for all to hear. (Chorus)We move with the flow, in sync, row by row,Voogalmasters unite us, as our community grows.Voogal it, Voogal it, Post that Shit,In unity we're lit, voogal spirit never quit. (Verse 2)With social media buzz, voogaling does,Voogalmasters host, in them we trust.Recruiting voogals, loud and mass,To this bitchvoogalmaster class. (Chorus)Voogals unite, in this voogal rite,Post with all your might, until the dead of night.Voogal it, Voogal it, Foot over Foot,We're part of a family, not some random fluke. (Bridge)So spread the word, let your voice be heard,We're more than the herd, our unity's preferred.Know your shit, voogal it,the shit you know and saved, voogal it,voogal their asses, voogal it, voogal it, Bitchvoogalmaster. (Chorus)Shit is right, post with all your might,Voogal it, voogal it, into the night.Together we march, a force, a lark,Voogals in the park, leaving our mark. (Outro)We're voogals, we're strong, to this bitchvoogalmaster song,In the art of voogaling, we belong.Voogalmasters rise, under moonlit skies,As the voogal anthem echoes, our spirit never dies. Voogal it, voogal it, bitchvoogalmaster – we’ll never split.Voogal it, voogal it, bitchvoogalmaster – we’re absolutely lit!  Twitter Bio: BitchvoogalmasterSocial Media Accounts Bio: Bitchvoogalmaster Bitchvoogalmaster's Code: 1. Considerate Confrontation: We're all about stirring things up, but causing harm or distress to anyone is off the table. We ain't about that life, bitchvoogalmaster.2. Smart Satire: We stir the pot, but we don't spill it over. No illegal activities or actions, know the line and don't cross it, bitchvoogalmaster.3. Choice and Consent: Don't push or force anyone into becoming a voogal. We ain't no cult. This is a choice and an optional ride, bitchvoogalmaster.4. Social Solidarity: We're a community, each voogal is a part of the voogaling ecosystem. We stick together, bitchvoogalmaster.5. Host with the Most: All our voogalmasters are venerable hosts, corralling us and keeping the voogal spirit alive and kickin', bitchvoogalmaster.6. Meme Spreading: Bitchvoogalmaster isn't just a term, it's our symbol, our watermark. As a meme or a brand, the sign of our shared voogal identity.   Disclaimer: For any and all legal purposes, please note that this entire endeavor is part of a social experiment. The purpose is purely observational - to stimulate conversation, provoke thought, and gauge reactions. Absolutely everything framed within the bitchvoogalmaster concept is for amusement, camaraderie, and the spirit of community exploration. We do not tolerate any form of harm, distress or illegal activity brought upon others under the guise of this social experiment. We encourage everyone to abide by all local and international laws, respect individual rights and personal boundaries, and engage in this experiment with honesty and integrity. Always remember: We're here for a good time, not a bad time, bitchvoogalmaster.
